title: The Herd-HOUR-1-A Winner, Not a Champion, Kansas City Chiefs, Sam Amick
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-1-A Winner, Not a Champion, Kansas City Chiefs, Sam Amick
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin today, and he opens the show with how not being a Champion doesn't necessarily mean you aren't a Winner. He then discusses Andy Reid and the Kansas City Chiefs building a dynasty and what that means for the future. Also Sam Amick joins the show to talk NBA playoffs and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
